name: ANXRacers
description:
ANXRacers is the best space racing game ever. Hundreds of players play it in a-sync multiplayer mode.

Race carefully across asteroid belts. Soaring jumps, loops, hairpin bends, debris fields, gaps... every track delivers a new and intense experience, offering sensational gaming across so many tracks.

Features:

  • 2 single player modes (Race, Endurance) on hundreds of progressively challenging tracks.
  • 3 type of spaceships offering finely tuned gameplay and racing experiences in hundreds of tracks
  • Join hundreds of players online on the ANXRacers servers.
  • Official rankings in solo and multiplayer. In solo play, along with earning medals for great racing, you can participate in official rankings by recording your best times on the game's tracks.
  • Create your own tracks, spaceships and videos with the ANXRacers trackeditor, shipyard and replay studio!

Note: for Itch.io users I will make a windows build if there is demand for it. Currently its available only for Android Mobiles and TVs
